channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Cherry-picked nonsense': Menendez's lawyers accuse government of 'fudging' facts
item.description: Sen. Bob Menendez's attorney accused prosecutors of "fudging" the facts and said the story they told is false and insufficient to convict during closing arguments.

item.title: Nvidia Stock Skyrocketed 150% in the 1st Half of 2024. Here's Why It Could Go Even Higher.
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Best hearing aids for seniors in 2024
item.description: The best hearing aids for seniors in 2024 are durable, efficient and easy to use.

item.title: NASA astronauts, stuck on ISS after Boeing Starliner issues, to give press conference
item.description: NASA astronauts Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams, who have been stuck on the ISS after issues with Boeing's Starliner, are set to give a press conference Wednesday.

item.title: John Bolton ‘Wouldn’t Put It Past’ Donald Trump To Pull This Running Mate Stunt
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Saudi Arabian Drilling Academy: Pioneering Hands-On Training in the Upstream Energy Sector
item.description: Discover how the Saudi Arabian Drilling Academy (SADA) is transforming the upstream energy sector through world-class hands-on training, state-of-the-art facilities, and a commitment to lifelong learning. Join us in exploring SADA’s innovative approach to developing globally competitive drilling professionals.

item.title: Here's what we know about Biden interview tapes being sought by Republicans
item.description: GOP lawmakers want to hear interview tapes of President Biden that they say could help determine whether his performance at last month's debate was just a "bad night."

item.title: Flying aboard the Ghostrider, a deadly aircraft carrying America’s biggest gun in the sky
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Pioneering FinTech in Libya: Masarat's Journey of Innovation
item.description: In a market hungry for innovative solutions, Masarat, a pioneering FinTech company in Libya, has thrived by embracing change. Over its two-decade journey, it has strategically chosen to be a thriver and trendsetter rather than succumb to challenges.

item.title: WATCH: Tornado touches down in Indiana as remnants of Beryl move toward Midwest
item.description: A destructive tornado touched down in Mount Vernon, Indiana, on Tuesday as the remnants of Hurricane Beryl moved across parts of the Midwest.

item.title: Remnants of Beryl roll through Tri-State, spawning tornadoes and causing damage
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Transforming the data storage industry for a sustainable future
item.description: Pure Storage is designing and delivering a sustainable data storage platform that enables organizations to dramatically reduce their energy and carbon footprint by up to 85% compared to competing storage solutions. Learn more at www.purestorage.com.

item.title: Armed suspect shot outside SCOTUS justice’s home
item.description: A deputy U.S. Marshal allegedly shot a man who attempted to carjack him outside of a Supreme Court justice's home, according to records.

item.title: California fast food workers now earn $20 per hour. Franchisees are responding by cutting hours.
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Amazon offering a $20 credit before Prime Day. Here's how to get it.
item.description: Amazon is offering a $20 credit ahead of its Prime Day, a two-day shopping event on July 16-17. Here's what to know.
